version_description:
• This version is provided free for 14 days to new users so that you can evaluate it. After that you can choose to buy it using an In-App purchase.
If you decide not to buy it you will still have full access to your current work, but will not be ab

• Fixes a bug that prevented some file types being imported into the Research Folder
• Fixes a bug that allowed versions to be added/deleted from collections & submissions
• Added a Cancel button to the Import menu
Fixed a crash under some conditions when marking a submission as 'replied'
